    • Field Detail

      • ATT_INDEX_PATH

        public static final java.lang.String ATT_INDEX_PATH
        An attribute holding the base path of the index. The full path will be this plus the class name plus "Index".
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ATT_DISABLED

        public static final java.lang.String ATT_DISABLED
        An attribute that when true disables use of the index.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ATT_FIELDS

        public static final java.lang.String ATT_FIELDS
        An attribute holding the definitions of the fields.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ATT_CLASSES

        public static final java.lang.String ATT_CLASSES
        An attribute holding a CSV list of classes to include in the index. Added for BundleManagedAttribute, no longer needed after the 7.1 refactoring.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ATT_INDEXER

        public static final java.lang.String ATT_INDEXER
        An attribute holding the name of the indexer class to use. If not specified it defaults to the name of this object followed by "Indexer".
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ATT_ANALYZER

        public static final java.lang.String ATT_ANALYZER
        An attribute holding the name of the org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer to use. If none is specified we default to our custom sailpoint.fulltext.CaseInsensitiveWhitespaceAnalyzer

        Older versions of the product used the org.apache.lucene.analysis.standard.StandardAnalyzer

        To specify a set of delimiter characters, use sailpoint.fulltext.CustomAnalyzer

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ATT_ANALYZER_CONFIG

        public static final java.lang.String ATT_ANALYZER_CONFIG
        An attribute holding a Map of configuration parameters to pass into configurable Analyzers. The only configurable Analyzer right now is sailpoint.fulltext.CustomAnalyzer
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ATT_INCLUDE_TARGETS

        public static final java.lang.String ATT_INCLUDE_TARGETS
        When true, include indexed attributes and permissions with both entitlements and roles. These are modeled as TargetAssociations built by Aggregator.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ATT_INCLUDE_DISABLED

        public static final java.lang.String ATT_INCLUDE_DISABLED
        When true, include objects that have been marked disabled. Currently this is only for the role indexes, LCM leaves out disabled roles, but the slicer/dicer wants them.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends SailPointObject>> getClasses()

        Throws:

      • getFieldMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,FullTextIndex.FullTextField> getFieldMap()

      • getField

        public FullTextIndex.FullTextField getField(java.lang.String name)

      • addTransientField

        public void addTransientField(FullTextIndex.FullTextField field)
        Sort of a kludge for Fulltextifier. "targets" is an implied field that does not need to be explicitly defined, but most of the code expects it to behave like other fields. This will inject runtime fields in the search map but won't add it to the _fields list so it won't be persisted by accident.
